rename.to: issue: Stange behaviour isValid form state

body: you are missing `onBlur` with the `Controller`, and your mode is set to `onBlur`

@bluebill1049 @JamesWong1999 Did you check out his codesandbox and add `onBlur`? It seems that still the `isValid` from `useFormState` acts differently than `isValid` from `const { formState: { isValid }} = useForm()`. With useFormState isValid switches between from `false | undefined | true`, whereas useForm is either true or false.

I also notice the `defaultValues`/`defaultValue` is missing as well.
![Screen Shot 2021-10-27 at 4 59 36 pm](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10513364/139008320-4aa99161-fa78-4bc2-bdb9-5bb7c8ec647b.png)
But the `undefined` is not expected outcome.

Thanks @bluebill1049 @lundn 

I tested with 7.18.1 and it's working.

@JamesWong1999 
I did not make a perfect code but the problem was not there. It was just an example.
